headline: Strong Cloud and Cybersecurity Demand Might Change the Case for Investing in CDW (CDW)
summary: CDW reported strong second-quarter results, with revenue rising 10.2% year over year and earnings surpassing analyst forecasts, driven by robust performance across core IT distribution and solutions. This outperformance highlights how increased cloud adoption and heightened cybersecurity demand are helping CDW overcome challenges such as reduced hardware demand and ongoing supply chain risks. Let's examine how CDW's stronger-than-expected Q2 results, especially in cloud and cybersecurity,...
